item.title: The point of living
item.description: You have been warned. These are random thoughts. After a lot of self evaluation, (or by asking a 5 year old kid), one realizes that the point of living is just being happy. “Don’t worry, be happy!” But then, why us? Any one else could have been happy in our place. One answer to this argument could be: Why bring about a change? You think you are special? Let the world be as it is.

item.title: Talk about punctuality!!
item.description: This wednesday, working at Goldman Sachs, I got a call from Santa Fe. The guy asked me when I wanted him to bring my luggage to my house. I said Saturday (yesterday) around 10 am.
